events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th. They submitted initial details including location and involved parties.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after review of the keywords in the customerâ€™s report and initial incident description.
An agent specializing in vehicle collisions was assigned to handle the incident, aiming for a swift and thorough claims process.
The customer received formal acknowledgement of the claim, reassuring them that their case is now in active review.
Additional documents including police report, vehicle repair estimates, and photos of the damaged car were requested from the customer.
Customer submitted all requested documentation promptly, including the police report and detailed repair shop invoices.
Investigation team began review of the submitted evidence, verifying the circumstances and assessing claim legitimacy.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and damage estimates consistent with report; claim validated successfully.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair costs and policy coverage limits, communicated clearly to the claimant.
Customer provided positive feedback on the claim handling process and expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement terms.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance, authorizing payment disbursement.
Payment for repairs was issued directly to the repair shop as agreed, ensuring the vehicle restoration could commence immediately.
Following successful payment and case completion, the claim was officially closed without outstanding issues.
All claim documents and communications were archived for record-keeping and future reference according to company policy.
